contentitemdata.kenticocommunity.qandaqu.QAndAQuestionPageContent:
Hello, is there any option to retrieve folders in the content hub? Something that has the same behavior as **IWebPageFolderRetriever**. We are receiving articles via API from a different site and we want to save them with **IContentItemManager** in folders according to their topic. For example: ``` Articles ----> Food | |--> Life style ````
**IContentFolderManager** can create new folders, but is there any way to check if a folder already exists?
---
**Environment** - Xperience by Kentico version: [29.1.5] - .NET version: [8] - Deployment environment: [local]
